audit_tmplt_created.full_name from (select full_name, user_id from srm_resources) audit_tmplt_created where audit_tmplt_created.user_id = odf_ca_odf_im00000002_ext.created_by) as created_by, where 1 = 1 and odf_ca_odf_im00000002_ext.odf_parent_id = odf_parent_id.odf_pk
